channel.title: Npc talking 637
channel.description:
package com.rs.game.player.dialogues; import com.rs.Settings; import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions; public class Spirit extends Dialogue { int npcId; @Override public void start() { //This is the start up when you click the npc it will talk to you first npcId = (Integer) parameters[0]; sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, "Hey, Welcome to OptimusScape." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //To change what the npc is saying just erase whats inside the qoute and add your own } @Override public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) { if (stage == -1) { //This is the starting stage stage = 0; //This is telling it to go to stage 0 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for your options "Can you tell me about OptimusScape?", //This is option 1 "Who are you?.", //This is option 2 } else if (stage == 0) { if (componentId == 1) { //This is the command for option 1 stage = 8; //This is telling it to go to stage 8 sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc "Can you, Lucien, tell me about OptimusScape?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect... } else if (componentId == 2) { //This is the command for option 2 stage = 9; //This is telling it to go to stage 9 sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc "Who are you?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect... } else end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected } else if (stage == 1) { //This is stage 1 stage = 2; //This is telling it to go to stage 2 after the npc is done talking sendEntityDialogue(SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 2 Text Lines for the NPC to talk to you new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, "This is an eco/pk server were you have alot of fun!", //This is the npc is saying you you in Text Line 1 "You can get around by using the teleports. If you need help, PM a staff member." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is the npc saying to you in Text Line 2 | Replace the 13482 with whatever you want the face expression to be } else if (stage == 2) { //This is stage 2 stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do sendDialogue(SEND_1_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for options "Can I donate for awesome Prizes?", //This is option 1 } else } else if (stage == 3) { if (componentId == 1) { //This is command for option 1 stage = 4; //This is telling it to go to stage 4 after you are done talking sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc "Can i Donate for awesome prizes?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what you are saying to the npc player.getIndex(), 9827); //This is the expression face ID again } else end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected } else if (stage == 4) { //This is stage 4 stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 after the npc is done talking sendEntityDialogue( SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send two text lines for the npc to say new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, //This grabs the npc's name and puts it at the top of the chat representing it talking to the you "Yes you can! Go the website now!", //This is what the npc is saying to you text line 1 "Donate and get cool items and a rank on forums." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is what the npc is saying to you in text line 2 |This is the expression face ID again } else end(); } @Override public void finish() { } }
i got 6 errors on this... how do i fix. here the errors [code]src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:25: error: illegal start of express ion } else if (stage == 0) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:25: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 0) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:52: error: illegal start of express ion } else ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:52: error: ';' expected } else ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:76: error: ';' expected public void finish() { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:80: error: reached end of file whil e parsing } ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Npc talking 637
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Youâ€™re defining an else if statement and there is no if statement that it is attaching to.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking 637
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.Settings;
import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;

public class Spirit extends Dialogue {

    int npcId;

    @Override
    public void start() { //This is the start up when you click the npc it will talk to you first
            npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
            sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
                            new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                            "Hey, Welcome to OptimusScape." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //To change what the npc is saying just erase whats inside the qoute and add your own
    }

    @Override
    public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
            if (stage == -1) { //This is the starting stage
                    stage = 0; //This is telling it to go to stage 0 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do
                    sendDialogue(SEND_2_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for your options
                                    "Can you tell me about OptimusScape?", //This is option 1
                                    "Who are you?.", //This is option 2                                   
            } else if (stage == 0) {
                    if (componentId == 1) { //This is the command for option 1
                            stage = 8; //This is telling it to go to stage 8
                            sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
                                            new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
                                                            "Can you, Lucien, tell me about OptimusScape?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
                                            player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
                                           
                    } else if (componentId == 2) {  //This is the command for option 2
                            stage = 9;  //This is telling it to go to stage 9
                            sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
                                            new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
                                                            "Who are you?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
                                            player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
                         } else
                            end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected
            } else if (stage == 1) { //This is stage 1
                    stage = 2; //This is telling it to go to stage 2 after the npc is done talking
                    sendEntityDialogue(SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 2 Text Lines for the NPC to talk to you
                                    new String[] {
                                                    NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
                                                    "This is an eco/pk server were you have alot of fun!", //This is the npc is saying you you in Text Line 1
                                                    "You can get around by using the teleports. If you need help, PM a staff member." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is the npc saying to you in Text Line 2 | Replace the 13482 with whatever you want the face expression to be
            } else if (stage == 2) { //This is stage 2
                    stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do
                    sendDialogue(SEND_1_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for options
                                    "Can I donate for awesome Prizes?", //This is option 1
	} else
  	} else if (stage == 3) {
                    if (componentId == 1) { //This is command for option 1
                            stage = 4; //This is telling it to go to stage 4 after you are done talking
                            sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say
                                            new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
                                                            "Can i Donate for awesome prizes?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what you are saying to the npc
                                            player.getIndex(), 9827); //This is the expression face ID again
                    } else
                            end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected
                           
            } else if (stage == 4) { //This is stage 4
                    stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 after the npc is done talking
                    sendEntityDialogue(
                                    SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send two text lines for the npc to say
                                    new String[] {
                                                    NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, //This grabs the npc's name and puts it at the top of the chat representing it talking to the you
                                                    "Yes you can! Go the website now!", //This is what the npc is saying to you text line 1
                                                    "Donate and get cool items and a rank on forums." }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is what the npc is saying to you in text line 2 |This is the expression face ID again
                            } else
                                    end();
    }

    @Override
    public void finish() {

    }

}

i got 6 errors on thisâ€¦ how do i fix. here the errors

src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:25: error: illegal start of express ion } else if (stage == 0) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:25: error: ';' expected } else if (stage == 0) { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:52: error: illegal start of express ion } else ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:52: error: ';' expected } else ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:76: error: ';' expected public void finish() { ^ src\com\rs\game\player\dialogues\Lucien.java:80: error: reached end of file whil e parsing } ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
